courseDetails.title: دليل ChatGPT: كيفية كسب المال عبر الإنترنت باستخدام ChatGPT
courseDetails.shortDescription: اكتساب المهارات اللازمة لكسب المال عبر الإنترنت باستخدام ChatGPT: استراتيجيات الكتابة، التسويق، وتحليل البيانات
courseDetails.longDescription:
هل ترغب في معرفة كيف يمكن لأدوات الذكاء الاصطناعي الحديثة مثل ChatGPT أن تساعدك في كسب المال عبر الإنترنت؟ هذه الدورة هي فرصتك المثالية لاكتشاف كيفية استخدام هذه الأداة المذهلة لتحقيق النجاح المالي في عالم الإنترنت الواسع. مع ChatGPT، يمكنك تحسين مهاراتك في الكتابة، التسويق الرقمي، والتحليل البياني لتحقيق دخل مستدام والعمل بشكل أكثر كفاءة.


في هذه الدورة الشاملة، سنأخذك خطوة بخطوة عبر استراتيجيات مجربة وفعالة لاستخدام ChatGPT لتحقيق أهدافك المالية. سواء كنت مبتدئًا تمامًا في العمل عبر الإنترنت أو لديك خبرة سابقة وترغب في تحسين مهاراتك، ستجد في هذه الدورة كل ما تحتاجه لتبدأ وتنجح. سنغطي كل شيء بدءًا من الكتابة الجذابة، مرورًا بالاستراتيجيات التسويقية المتقدمة، وصولاً إلى تحسين محركات البحث (SEO) واستخدام ChatGPT لتحليل البيانات وزيادة الأداء.


ماذا ستتعلم في هذه الدورة؟


  • استخدام ChatGPT لكتابة محتوى جذاب وفعّال: تعلم كيفية إنتاج نصوص عالية الجودة في وقت قصير، سواء كانت مقالات، مدونات، أو نصوص تسويقية.

  • استراتيجيات التسويق بالعمولة: استكشف كيفية استخدام ChatGPT للترويج للمنتجات والخدمات عبر الإنترنت وكسب العمولات. تعلم كيف تختار المنتجات التي تناسب جمهورك وتكتب محتوى مميزًا يحفز المتابعين على الشراء.

  • تحسين محركات البحث (SEO): فهم كيفية تحسين ظهور محتواك على محركات البحث باستخدام ChatGPT. تعلم استراتيجيات البحث عن الكلمات الرئيسية وتحسين النصوص لتحقيق أفضل نتائج في البحث.

  • تحليل البيانات واستخدام الذكاء الاصطناعي لتحسين استراتيجيات العمل: تعلم كيف يمكن لـ ChatGPT مساعدتك في تحليل البيانات واستخلاص الأفكار الرئيسية التي يمكن أن تحسن من استراتيجياتك التجارية.

  • التسويق الرقمي وبناء العلامة التجارية: تعلم كيفية بناء وتوسيع علامتك التجارية عبر الإنترنت من خلال أدوات ChatGPT. ستتعلم كيف يمكنك التفاعل مع جمهورك، إنشاء محتوى ملهم وجذاب، وزيادة التفاعل والمبيعات.


لماذا يجب عليك الانضمام إلى هذه الدورة؟


  • دورة شاملة وسهلة المتابعة: ستتمكن من تعلم كيفية استخدام ChatGPT من الألف إلى الياء، بدءًا من الأساسيات وصولًا إلى الاستراتيجيات المتقدمة. ستكون قادرًا على تطبيق هذه المهارات في حياتك المهنية اليومية لتحقيق نتائج ملموسة.

  • فرص لا حصر لها: باستخدام ChatGPT، يمكنك فتح مجموعة من الفرص في الكتابة، التسويق، خدمة العملاء، وتحليل البيانات. ستتمكن من تحسين عملك الشخصي أو حتى بدء عمل تجاري جديد عبر الإنترنت.

  • زيادة إنتاجيتك وتقليل الوقت المستغرق: ستتعلم كيف يمكن لـ ChatGPT مساعدتك في إنجاز المهام بسرعة ودقة، مما يتيح لك التركيز على جوانب أخرى من عملك أو حياتك الشخصية.

  • تحقيق دخل مستدام: سواء كنت تعمل في التسويق بالعمولة، كتابة المحتوى، أو تقديم استشارات، ستتمكن من استخدام ChatGPT لتحسين استراتيجياتك وزيادة دخلك عبر الإنترنت بشكل مستدام.

  • مناسب لجميع المستويات: سواء كنت مبتدئًا أو محترفًا، فإن هذه الدورة ستوفر لك الأدوات والمعرفة التي تحتاجها للنجاح في عالم العمل عبر الإنترنت.


محتوى الدورة: تتكون الدورة من 12 وحدة تعليمية، تحتوي كل وحدة على دروس تطبيقية وأمثلة حية. ستتعلم في هذه الدورة:


  1. كيفية كتابة محتوى مقنع باستخدام ChatGPT.

  2. طرق فعّالة لاستخدام ChatGPT في التسويق بالعمولة.

  3. استراتيجيات لتحسين محركات البحث وزيادة ظهور محتواك.

  4. كيفية استخدام ChatGPT لتحليل البيانات وتطوير استراتيجيات جديدة.

  5. كيفية بناء وتوسيع علامتك التجارية الشخصية باستخدام الذكاء الاصطناعي.


من هو المستفيد من هذه الدورة؟


  • المبتدئون: إذا كنت مبتدئًا في العمل عبر الإنترنت، فإن هذه الدورة ستقدم لك المعرفة الأساسية التي تحتاجها للبدء في استخدام ChatGPT لتحقيق دخل إضافي.

  • المحترفون في التسويق الرقمي: إذا كنت بالفعل تعمل في التسويق أو الكتابة، فهذه الدورة ستساعدك على تحسين مهاراتك وزيادة كفاءتك باستخدام ChatGPT.

  • أصحاب الأعمال الحرة والمستقلين: ستتمكن من استخدام ChatGPT لتحسين عملك الحر، بدءًا من كتابة المحتوى، وصولًا إلى تقديم استشارات وتحسين محركات البحث.


ابدأ الآن!


لا تفوت فرصة تعلم كيفية استخدام واحدة من أقوى أدوات الذكاء الاصطناعي لزيادة دخلك وتحقيق النجاح عبر الإنترنت. سجّل اليوم وابدأ في تطبيق ChatGPT لتحقيق أهدافك المهنية والمالية!
targetAudiences: المبتدئون في العمل عبر الإنترنت هؤلاء هم الأفراد الذين يتطلعون إلى تعلم طرق جديدة لكسب المال عبر الإنترنت باستخدام أدوات الذكاء الاصطناعي مثل ChatGPT. لا يمتلكون خبرة سابقة في هذا المجال ويرغبون في بناء مهاراتهم من البداية.

المهنيون الذين يرغبون في تحسين مهاراتهم في الكتابة والتسويق الرقمي هؤلاء المهنيون لديهم خلفية في الكتابة أو التسويق الرقمي ويرغبون في تعلم كيفية استخدام ChatGPT لتحسين إنتاجيتهم وزيادة دخلهم عبر الإنترنت من خلال كتابة المحتوى، التسويق بالعمولة، أو تحسين محركات البحث.

الرياديون وأصحاب المشاريع الصغيرة هؤلاء الأشخاص لديهم مشاريع أو أعمال صغيرة ويبحثون عن طرق مبتكرة لاستخدام ChatGPT لتطوير استراتيجيات التسويق، تحسين خدمة العملاء، وزيادة الوعي بالعلامة التجارية، بالإضافة إلى تحسين أداء أعمالهم عبر الإنترنت.

courseDetails.title: TikTok Domination: Unlock the Secrets to Viral Growth
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to create viral TikTok campaigns, grow your business, and engage with the TikTok community using proven strategies
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you looking to tap into the power of TikTok to market your business and grow your brand? 

With over 1 billion active users, TikTok has become the go-to platform for brands, influencers, and entrepreneurs who want to connect with younger audiences, increase brand awareness, and generate real engagement. Whether you're completely new to TikTok or have been experimenting with it, this comprehensive course will give you the tools, strategies, and confidence to master TikTok marketing in 2024.

In this course, you'll discover:

  • What TikTok is and why it matters for businesses today.

  • How to create engaging content that resonates with TikTok’s younger audience.

  • Proven strategies for growing your followers and driving engagement.

  • How to launch viral hashtag challenges and leverage influencer marketing.

  • The types of content that work best on TikTok, from music videos to duets and comedy skits.

  • How to analyse and optimise your TikTok campaigns for maximum success.

From setting up your profile to creating content that stands out, this course covers everything you need to know to market your business on TikTok. You’ll see real-world case studies of brands that have successfully used TikTok to grow and how you can replicate their success. By the end of the course, you’ll be ready to create viral content, increase engagement, and convert followers into loyal customers.

If you're looking to take your social media marketing strategy to the next level, enroll now and unlock the power of TikTok for your business!

Whether you're a business owner, marketer, or content creator, this course will equip you with the skills to harness the full potential of TikTok.
targetAudiences: Entrepreneurs and business owners looking to expand their reach.
Marketers who want to leverage the TikTok platform to increase brand visibility.
Creators who want to grow their following on TikTok and generate revenue.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT-gids: hoe u online geld kunt verdienen met ChatGPT
courseDetails.shortDescription: Leer hoe je ChatGPT effectief kunt gebruiken om online geld te verdienen: Van contentcreatie tot marketingstrategieën
courseDetails.longDescription:
Wil je leren hoe je ChatGPT kunt gebruiken om online geld te verdienen? In deze uitgebreide cursus leer je precies hoe je deze krachtige AI-tool kunt inzetten om jouw online bedrijf te laten groeien. Van contentcreatie tot marketingstrategieën, ChatGPT biedt talloze mogelijkheden om je werk efficiënter te maken en je inkomsten online te verhogen. Of je nu een beginnende ondernemer bent, een freelancer die zijn werk wil uitbreiden, of een digitale professional die nieuwe vaardigheden wil leren, deze cursus is ontworpen om je te helpen succes te behalen in de digitale wereld.


ChatGPT is meer dan alleen een tekstgenerator; het is een veelzijdige tool die je in staat stelt om snel en effectief hoogwaardige content te creëren. In deze cursus ontdek je hoe je deze technologie kunt gebruiken om blogposts, productbeschrijvingen, advertenties en social media-berichten te genereren. Bovendien leer je hoe je ChatGPT kunt inzetten om marketingstrategieën te ontwikkelen, zoekmachineoptimalisatie (SEO) te verbeteren en je klantcommunicatie te automatiseren, waardoor je waardevolle tijd bespaart.


De cursus is perfect voor iedereen die zijn online bedrijf naar een hoger niveau wil tillen. We behandelen de verschillende manieren waarop je geld kunt verdienen met behulp van ChatGPT, waaronder freelance schrijven, het creëren van online cursussen, het verkopen van producten via e-commerce en het genereren van inkomsten met affiliate marketing. Je leert hoe je met behulp van ChatGPT snel en efficiënt inhoud kunt genereren, wat je helpt om sneller te groeien en meer klanten aan te trekken.


Wat kun je verwachten van deze cursus?


  • Effectieve Contentcreatie: Leer hoe je ChatGPT gebruikt om snel artikelen, blogposts en social media-inhoud te schrijven die je doelgroep aanspreken.

  • Marketing en SEO: Ontdek hoe je ChatGPT kunt inzetten om productbeschrijvingen, advertenties en andere marketingmaterialen te creëren die je zichtbaarheid vergroten en meer verkopen genereren.

  • Verantwoord AI-gebruik: Begrijp de ethische overwegingen en verantwoordelijkheden bij het gebruik van kunstmatige intelligentie, zodat je ChatGPT op een verantwoorde en effectieve manier kunt gebruiken.

  • Freelance en E-commerce Strategieën: Leer hoe je als freelancer kunt werken met ChatGPT of een e-commercebedrijf kunt opzetten, van productbeschrijvingen tot klantenservice.

  • Tijd- en Productiviteitswinst: Ontdek hoe je de productiviteit van je online werk kunt verhogen door ChatGPT te integreren in je dagelijkse taken, zodat je meer tijd hebt om te focussen op andere belangrijke aspecten van je bedrijf.


Deze cursus biedt jou de tools en strategieën die je nodig hebt om met ChatGPT online succesvol te worden. Of je nu een nieuw bedrijf wilt starten of je bestaande bedrijf wilt uitbreiden, deze cursus biedt waardevolle inzichten en praktische tips die je direct kunt toepassen. Na het voltooien van de cursus heb je niet alleen een diepgaand begrip van hoe je ChatGPT kunt gebruiken om inkomsten te genereren, maar ben je ook voorbereid op de toekomst van digitale marketing en AI-toepassingen in het bedrijfsleven.


Waarom zou je deze cursus volgen?


  • Leer snel en efficiënt online geld verdienen: Ontdek hoe je ChatGPT kunt gebruiken om waardevolle inhoud te genereren en je online inkomsten te verhogen.

  • Optimaliseer je workflow: Verhoog je productiviteit door ChatGPT in te zetten voor contentcreatie, klantenservice, en marketing.

  • Leer praktische strategieën die je direct kunt toepassen: Krijg toegang tot concrete tips, voorbeelden en technieken die je kunt gebruiken om je bedrijf te laten groeien.

  • Ontwikkel een sterke basis in AI-gebruik: Begrijp hoe je AI op een ethische en verantwoordelijke manier kunt inzetten in je bedrijf.


Schrijf je vandaag nog in voor deze cursus en begin met het leren van de waardevolle vaardigheden die je nodig hebt om succesvol online geld te verdienen met ChatGPT. Of je nu je eerste stappen zet in de online wereld of al ervaring hebt, deze cursus biedt de kennis en hulpmiddelen om jouw bedrijf te laten bloeien in de digitale wereld.
targetAudiences: Beginnende ondernemers: Deze cursus is ideaal voor mensen die net beginnen met hun eigen online bedrijf en geïnteresseerd zijn in het gebruik van ChatGPT om hun werk efficiënter te maken en online inkomsten te genereren.

Freelancers en contentmakers: Deze groep omvat schrijvers, bloggers, social media managers en andere contentmakers die hun productiviteit willen verhogen door ChatGPT in te zetten voor het creëren van inhoud en het verbeteren van hun online marketingstrategieën.

Marketeers en digitale professionals: Deze cursus is geschikt voor marketeers, SEO-specialisten en digitale professionals die willen leren hoe ze ChatGPT kunnen gebruiken om content te genereren, SEO te verbeteren en marketingcampagnes te optimaliseren voor hun klanten of bedrijven.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT Guide: Sådan tjener du penge online med ChatGPT
courseDetails.shortDescription: Lær at tjene penge online med ChatGPT: Effektive strategier til freelancearbejde og digital markedsføring
courseDetails.longDescription:
Er du klar til at tage kontrollen over din økonomi og lære, hvordan du kan tjene penge online ved hjælp af den nyeste AI-teknologi? I dette kursus lærer du, hvordan du effektivt bruger ChatGPT til at generere indhold, oprette digitale produkter og forbedre din markedsføring. Uanset om du er ny på området, ønsker at starte din egen freelance-forretning, eller vil optimere din eksisterende online markedsføring, vil du finde værdifulde strategier og teknikker, der hjælper dig med at opnå dine mål.


ChatGPT er en kraftfuld AI-assistent, der kan hjælpe dig med at skabe tekstbaseret indhold hurtigt og effektivt. I dette kursus dykker vi ned i, hvordan du bruger denne teknologi til at maksimere din indtjening online. Du vil lære at bruge ChatGPT til en række formål – fra oprettelse af engagerende blogindlæg og sociale medieindlæg til at generere e-mails, der engagerer dit publikum.


Hvad kan du forvente at lære i dette kursus?


  • Skabe Effektivt Indhold: Lær hvordan du bruger ChatGPT til at skrive blogindlæg, artikler, produktbeskrivelser og sociale medieopslag, der fanger opmærksomheden hos dine læsere og øger din synlighed online.

  • Oprette og Sælge Digitale Produkter: Få indsigt i, hvordan du kan oprette og sælge digitale produkter som e-bøger, online kurser og skabeloner ved hjælp af ChatGPT. Du vil få praktiske tips til, hvordan du kan bruge AI til at generere idéer og skabe produkter, der tiltrækker kunder.

  • Udnytte Freelance- og Konsulentmuligheder: Lær hvordan du kan finde freelance-arbejde, opbygge en portefølje og bruge ChatGPT til at optimere dit arbejde. Uanset om du vil tilbyde skrivetjenester, marketingstrategier eller konsulenttjenester, vil ChatGPT hjælpe dig med at gøre arbejdet lettere og mere effektivt.

  • Forbedre Din Markedsføring: Få dybdegående viden om, hvordan du bruger ChatGPT til at forbedre dine markedsføringsstrategier. Lær at skrive overbevisende salgs-e-mails, skabe indhold til dine sociale medier og optimere dine kampagner med AI-genererede ideer.


Hvorfor vælge dette kursus?


  • Dette kursus er praktisk orienteret og inkluderer trin-for-trin vejledninger, så du kan komme hurtigt i gang med at bruge ChatGPT til at skabe indtægtsmuligheder online.

  • Du vil lære, hvordan du bruger AI til at spare tid og samtidig producere professionelt indhold af høj kvalitet.

  • Du vil få de nødvendige færdigheder til at opbygge en solid online tilstedeværelse og skabe en stabil indkomststrøm, enten som freelancer, konsulent eller digital produktforhandler.

  • Vi inkluderer også konkrete eksempler og casestudier, så du kan se præcise måder, hvorpå ChatGPT har hjulpet andre til at opnå succes online.


Er dette kursus for dig?


Dette kursus er ideelt for iværksættere, freelancere, små virksomhedsejere og alle, der ønsker at udnytte kraften i AI for at opnå økonomisk frihed. Hvis du er nybegynder og ønsker at lære, hvordan du kan generere penge online, eller hvis du allerede er en erfaren forretningsperson, der ønsker at udnytte de nyeste teknologier til at forbedre din arbejdsproces, så er dette kursus perfekt for dig.


Tag kontrol over din fremtid i dag – lær hvordan du kan tjene penge online ved hjælp af ChatGPT!
targetAudiences: Nyuddannede og iværksættere, der ønsker at lære, hvordan de kan generere indtægter online ved hjælp af ChatGPT
Freelancere og konsulenter, der ønsker at optimere deres arbejdsgange og skabe effektivt indhold med ChatGPT
Marketingprofessionelle og små virksomhedsejere, der ønsker at bruge AI til at forbedre deres markedsføringsstrategier og skabe engagerende indhold

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & IA: Formação Completa em Inteligência Artificial
courseDetails.shortDescription: Domine o ChatGPT, IA e a Engenharia de Prompt: Chat GPT, Dall-e, Copilot | O curso essencial de inteligência artificial
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formação Completa ChatGPT & IAs Generativas

Você está pronto para começar cada dia com um aliado, um assistente pessoal extremamente talentoso, pronto para realizar suas tarefas com precisão e rapidez incomparáveis?

Uma IA capaz de redigir seus e-mails, artigos ou relatórios, criar imagens inspiradoras, analisar dados complexos, programar soluções sob medida e resolver uma infinidade de problemas, permitindo que você se concentre no que realmente importa.

Para aproveitar todos esses benefícios da IA, é essencial dominá-la. Muitas pessoas se empolgam, fazem 2 ou 3 prompts e acabam abandonando o assunto sem descobrir o verdadeiro potencial da inteligência artificial. Esse comportamento muitas vezes revela um desconhecimento das técnicas, métodos e configurações que permitem obter os melhores resultados com a IA.

O objetivo desta formação é fornecer todas as chaves para comunicar eficazmente com a IA, configurá-la da melhor forma e aproveitá-la ao máximo.

Para alcançar isso, concebi um percurso conciso e dinâmico que permitirá a você desenvolver os conhecimentos e competências essenciais para a utilização otimizada da IA.

Durante esta formação, veremos juntos:

  • Como formular requisições claras para a IA para obter as melhores respostas possíveis.

  • Como configurar o ChatGPT para que ele se torne seu professor, co-fundador ou analista de confiança.

  • Como gerar múltiplas ideias e se tornar melhor no seu trabalho, mais produtivo, rápido, relevante e eficiente.

  • Como aproveitar ao máximo a multimodalidade do ChatGPT para escrever, falar, ouvir, transmitir imagens e pedir que ele as interprete.

  • Como fazer o Dall-e ou o Copilot gerar as melhores imagens possíveis.

  • Como encontrar alternativas interessantes para a versão paga do ChatGPT.

  • Exploraremos outras IAs como Copilot, Claude e Gemini.

  • Veremos como adaptar o ChatGPT às suas preferências e necessidades específicas para respostas personalizadas.

  • Vamos descobrir como potencializar o ChatGPT com os GPTs: como usar essas aplicações e até mesmo como criá-las sem ser um desenvolvedor.

  • Exploraremos tópicos mais técnicos no final da formação, como gerenciamento de API, playground, integração do ChatGPT com outros softwares como Excel ou Google Sheets, por exemplo.

  • E, sobretudo, veremos que tudo isso é acessível a todos, mesmo aos iniciantes.

Nesta formação, você encontrará:

  • Demonstrações concretas.

  • Fichas técnicas e guias práticos para download.

[Atualização: Adicionei vídeos sobre o uso do modelo GPT-4o, que sucede a versão GPT-4]

Em resumo, você está prestes a seguir um curso claro, acessível e envolvente. Detalhado o suficiente para cobrir os conceitos essenciais sem se prolongar demais. Não importa o seu nível de partida, seja você iniciante ou esteja em busca de técnicas avançadas, esta é a única formação que você precisará para dominar o ChatGPT.

Minha apresentação:

Meu nome é Yassine Rochd, sou fundador de uma organização de treinamento que ajudou milhares de aprendizes a alcançar seus objetivos profissionais. Sou também apaixonado por tecnologia. Após um mestrado em finanças e experiências em consultoria e fundos de investimento, fiz uma formação em desenvolvimento web e passei centenas de horas descobrindo e utilizando IAs. Hoje, desejo transmitir de forma clara o que aprendi nos últimos anos.

Certificação e Garantia:

  • Ao concluir esta formação, você receberá uma certificação que poderá compartilhar até mesmo no LinkedIn.

  • Esta formação é também sem riscos, pois você tem uma garantia de "satisfação ou reembolso" de 30 dias.

  • Você terá acesso vitalício à formação e aos recursos para download.

Você está a um clique de dominar uma tecnologia extremamente útil que tornará você mais eficiente, mais produtivo e simplesmente indispensável.


Detalhamento das Diferentes Seções deste Curso

Introdução Rápida ao ChatGPT

Descubra como dominar rapidamente o ChatGPT em apenas alguns vídeos. Mergulhe na interface intuitiva do ChatGPT e aprenda a criar seus primeiros prompts para aproveitar ao máximo o poder da IA. Seja para gerar tabelas, fazer brainstorming, gerar ideias, traduzir e corrigir textos, ou até redigir diversos conteúdos, você será mais rápido e eficiente com a IA. Descubra como o ChatGPT pode ajudá-lo na sua busca de emprego e se adaptar às suas necessidades profissionais para aumentar sua eficiência. Você verá que o ChatGPT é capaz de criar uma variedade de conteúdos, desde e-mails e cartas até artigos e postagens para redes sociais, sem esquecer a redação de códigos de programação.

Fundamentos do Prompt Engineering

Aprenda por que o prompt engineering é essencial e como ele pode transformar o ChatGPT em um verdadeiro especialista. Compreenda a importância do contexto e dos objetivos para estruturar suas interações, e descubra como ajustar o formato e a temperatura para otimizar seus prompts e variar o nível de criatividade do modelo. Personalize suas interações dominando o tom e o estilo, e aproveite 5 dicas práticas para obter respostas ainda mais pertinentes do ChatGPT.

Técnicas Avançadas de Prompt Engineering

Nesta seção, veremos como criar prompts que geram outros prompts. Estudaremos o método de reverse engineering, funcionalidades de busca na web, interpretação de imagens e muitas outras técnicas avançadas.

Dall-e

Em seguida, abordaremos a geração de imagens com Dall-e. Você verá como passar de um resultado mediano a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, como modificar de forma simples e rápida partes de imagens e otimizar seus resultados. Também estudaremos técnicas avançadas que permitirão, por exemplo, criar uma continuidade na geração de um personagem de ficção ou quadrinhos, para resultados ainda mais impressionantes.

Soluções para as Limitações do ChatGPT e da IA

ChatGPT e outros modelos de inteligência artificial apresentam limitações e fraquezas. Nesta seção, veremos quais são essas limitações e como superá-las.

Funcionalidades Interessantes do ChatGPT

Aprenda a configurar as funcionalidades de compartilhamento de suas conversas para uma utilização colaborativa do ChatGPT. Aproveite ao máximo o aplicativo móvel do ChatGPT, explorando todas as opções que ele oferece. Por fim, descubra métodos para criar conteúdo único com a IA, evitando qualquer forma de plágio ou conteúdo duplicado.

Copilot e Bing

O Copilot oferece várias alternativas interessantes para funcionalidades pagas e avançadas do ChatGPT. Veremos como aproveitar a parceria entre a Microsoft e a OpenAI para acessar funcionalidades avançadas de inteligência artificial integradas ao motor de busca Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral e Outros

Dando continuidade à seção anterior, estudaremos outras IAs, como o Gemini do Google e o Claude da Anthropic. Veremos suas forças, fraquezas e analisaremos vários casos de uso para saber em quais situações preferi-las ao ChatGPT.

Custom Instructions no ChatGPT

Adapte o ChatGPT às suas necessidades e expectativas. Aprenda a personalizar suas interações configurando suas custom instructions. Descubra também os pontos de atenção para uma utilização ótima.

Os GPTs

Descubra como funcionam os GPTs, essas miniaplicações hiperespecializadas que podem, às vezes, superar o ChatGPT. Aprenda a criar seu próprio GPT passo a passo. Domine as chamadas de API para maximizar as capacidades do ChatGPT e, ao final da seção, descubra como monetizar seus GPTs e, mais amplamente, como ganhar dinheiro com o ChatGPT.

Gestão de API & Playground

Explore o playground do ChatGPT e descubra as novas funcionalidades que ele oferece. Aprenda a chamar a API do ChatGPT com níveis crescentes de dificuldade. Assim, você poderá usar o ChatGPT fora da interface, criar um chatbot em outro site ou até mesmo integrar o ChatGPT a outros softwares, como Google Sheets ou Excel, por exemplo.
targetAudiences: Qualquer pessoa que deseje dominar a IA e o ChatGPT. Esta formação é adequada para todos os níveis.

courseDetails.title: Sales Closing Guide: How to Effectively Close Sales
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Proven Techniques for Closing Sales, Overcoming Objections, and Building Lasting Customer Relationships
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock your potential as a sales professional with our comprehensive course, "Sales Closing Guide: How to Effectively Close Sales." In an increasingly competitive market, the ability to close deals is crucial for achieving success and driving business growth. Whether you're an aspiring salesperson, a seasoned professional looking to sharpen your skills, an entrepreneur, or a marketing expert wanting to understand the sales process better, this course equips you with the essential techniques and strategies needed to effectively close sales and create lasting customer relationships.


This course takes you on a detailed journey through the entire sales process, focusing on practical skills that can be applied immediately to enhance your effectiveness. You will learn about the key stages of the sales process—from prospecting to follow-up—and understand the significance of each stage in successfully closing sales. We will delve into the psychology behind buying decisions, empowering you to connect with prospects on a deeper level.


Throughout the course, you will master proven closing techniques that are essential for success. Techniques such as the assumptive close and the urgency close will be explored in depth, providing you with the confidence to guide conversations toward a successful outcome. You'll learn how to recognize verbal and non-verbal cues, enabling you to adjust your approach based on the prospect's reactions and needs.


Effective communication is at the heart of closing sales, and this course will teach you how to enhance your communication skills. You will discover the importance of active listening and how to employ persuasive language to engage prospects effectively. By practicing these techniques, you’ll not only build rapport but also create an environment where prospects feel valued and understood.


One of the key challenges in sales is overcoming objections. In this course, you’ll learn strategies for addressing common objections and turning them into opportunities for dialogue. By adopting a mindset that views objections as a chance to deepen your understanding of the prospect’s needs, you will transform potential roadblocks into stepping stones toward closing the sale.


Moreover, we will emphasize the critical importance of follow-up after closing the deal. You will learn how to maintain relationships with customers post-sale, ensuring their satisfaction and fostering loyalty. By mastering the art of follow-up, you can identify upselling opportunities and create a strong customer base that drives repeat business and referrals.


Engaging lessons, real-world examples, and actionable insights make this course a dynamic learning experience. Each module is designed to equip you with the tools you need to navigate the complexities of sales with confidence.


Join us on this transformative journey to become a more confident and effective closer. Whether you are looking to boost your sales career, grow your business, or simply enhance your selling skills, this course is your pathway to success. Enroll today and start mastering the art of closing sales—your success story awaits!
targetAudiences: Sales Professionals: This group includes individuals who are currently working in sales roles, such as account executives, sales representatives, and business development professionals. They are looking to enhance their closing skills, improve their sales techniques, and increase their overall effectiveness in converting leads into customers

Entrepreneurs and Small Business Owners: This group consists of entrepreneurs and owners of small businesses who engage in direct sales as part of their operations. They seek to learn effective closing strategies to boost their sales performance and grow their businesses, particularly in competitive markets where strong closing skills can make a significant difference

Marketing Professionals: This group includes marketing specialists who want to deepen their understanding of the sales process and how effective closing techniques can complement their marketing efforts. By learning to close sales effectively, they can better support sales teams, create more aligned marketing campaigns, and understand customer needs throughout the sales funnel

courseDetails.title: Build a User Web App from Scratch with Vanilla PHP 8+
courseDetails.shortDescription: Build a real example web application from scratch with PHP 8 and MySQL
courseDetails.longDescription:
Learn how to build a robust and reusable PHP web application with MySQL from scratch! Build your own clean and reusable PHP framework you will be able to reuse for your further projects and side projects.


This course is a step-by-step course, without any complicated 3rd-party frameworks, where you will learn and build a complete PHP 8 framework from the ground up, and later in the course, we will cover some great Composer PHP packages to be used in our project as well. For instance, you will also learn how to send emails efficiently with the Symfony Mailer package.


The screencast videos literally cover everything (nothing is hidden!), allowing you to understand and follow the whole evolution of the web application.

You will learn how to build a modern, clean and flexible framework following the best coding practices and PHP standard recommendations (PSR) allowing you to reuse it easily for your next SaaS.


At the end of the course, you will be confident to build any kind of real-world web application for your next business idea or to take your freelance career to the next level! You will also be able to implement your very own unique ideas and concepts from the codebase of this course.

Finally, once you subscribe to this course, I will do my best to answer your questions within a few hours. I know how challenging it can be to build a whole web application and I want you to succeed in building the web application you want.
targetAudiences: Anyone interested in building a modern & clean web Application
Anyone interested in building a real world PHP web application, similar to “Buy Me A Coffee”
Anyone interesting in building a membership website from A to Z
Anyone interesting in building their own PHP framework based on a maintainable and scalable architecture pattern
Level up your skillset and confidence in PHP / OOP for complex applications

This comprehensive course will take you through everything you need to know about local SEO, from the basics to advanced techniques, ensuring you have the skills and knowledge to dominate local search results.


What You'll Learn:

  • Google My Business Optimization: Master the setup and optimization of your Google My Business profile for maximum visibility. We’ll walk you through every step to ensure your profile is complete, accurate, and engaging.

  • Effective Keyword Strategies: Discover effective keyword strategies tailored to local searches that attract your target audience. You’ll learn how to research and select the best local keywords to improve your rankings and visibility in search results.

Real Estate Agents and Local Service Providers

courseDetails.title: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship, Intrapreneurship, Startup, Business Module, Growth
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship is a program designed to equip professionals with the advanced skills, strategies, and visionary thinking required to navigate the intricate world of modern corporate entrepreneurship. This course offers a deep exploration of the dynamic landscape of corporate innovation and entrepreneurship, covering an  array of topics that are crucial for individuals aiming to spearhead innovation, drive growth, and foster entrepreneurial cultures within established organizations.


Course Outline:

Understanding Modern Corporate Entrepreneurship:

The Role of Innovation: Analyzing the central role of innovation as the driving force behind corporate entrepreneurship and market disruption. Distinguishing Entrepreneurship from Intrapreneurship.

Comparative Analysis: Differentiating between external entrepreneurship and internal intrapreneurship, emphasizing their distinct attributes and applications.

Real-world Case Studies: Exploring diverse examples of both entrepreneurship and intrapreneurship to showcase their practical implications.


Exploring Intrapreneurship Types and Case Studies:

Categories of Intrapreneurial Endeavors: Investigating various forms of intrapreneurship, including product innovation and process enhancement.

Intrapreneurship Success Stories: Examining case studies of successful intrapreneurial initiatives within renowned organizations across industries.


Challenges of Cultivating Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Identifying Obstacles: Analyzing the inherent challenges that organizations face when attempting to foster a culture of corporate entrepreneurship.

Strategies for Overcoming Challenges: Developing proactive strategies to address resistance to change, risk aversion, and organizational inertia.


Taxonomy of Intrapreneurial Personalities:

Intrapreneurial Archetypes: Defining different profiles of intrapreneurs, including idea generators, project champions, and disruptive catalysts.

Nurturing Intrapreneurial Talent: Strategies for recognizing and nurturing individuals with intrapreneurial potential within the workforce.


Nurturing and Leading Intrapreneurs:

Fostering a Supportive Ecosystem: Creating an environment that encourages creativity, experimentation, and calculated risk-taking.

Empowerment Strategies: Providing intrapreneurs with resources, autonomy, and mentorship to propel their innovative endeavors.


Becoming an Intrapreneurial Leader:

Personal Transformation: Cultivating the mindset and skillset necessary for individuals to lead with intrapreneurial spirit within their roles.

Influence and Impact: Strategies for inspiring teams, driving change, and championing innovation from within.


Diverse Models of Corporate Entrepreneurship:

Frameworks for Integration: Exploring a spectrum of models and frameworks organizations can adopt to infuse entrepreneurial principles into their DNA.

Case Studies: Analyzing the practical implementation of various models in successful corporate entrepreneurship initiatives.


Unlocking Growth with Strategic Innovation:

Growth Hacking Strategies: Delving into the innovative techniques and agile approaches that drive rapid business expansion.

Engines of Growth: Investigating the mechanisms that fuel accelerated growth in startups and established enterprises.

Market Expansion Theories and Growth Matrices:


Market Penetration vs. Expansion:

Exploring market expansion theories and their pivotal role in strategic decision-making for growth.

Growth Matrix Applications: Applying growth matrices to identify growth opportunities, allocate resources, and diversify product portfolios.


Corporate Venturing and Innovation Ecosystems:

Corporate Venturing Strategies: Understanding the concept of corporate venturing and its impact on driving innovation through external partnerships.

Navigating Innovation Ecosystems: Examining how organizations can collaborate with startups, academia, and research centers to fuel innovation.


Importance for Companies and Employees:

The landscape of modern business is marked by rapid technological advancements, evolving customer preferences, and dynamic competitive pressures. In such an environment, corporate entrepreneurship stands as a beacon of resilience and adaptability for organizations. The Comprehensive Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence serves as a critical learning pathway for companies seeking to stay at the forefront of innovation and leverage entrepreneurial agility to secure sustainable growth.


For Companies:

Cultivating Innovation Culture: The course equips companies with the tools and methodologies to foster an innovation-driven culture, enabling them to stay ahead of disruption and drive continuous improvement.

Seizing New Opportunities: Organizations that embrace corporate entrepreneurship are better positioned to identify emerging market trends, seize untapped opportunities, and create innovative solutions that resonate with customers.

Navigating Disruption: The skills gained from this course empower companies to navigate disruptive forces by fostering an agile mindset, encouraging creative problem-solving, and capitalizing on change.


For Employees:

Career Acceleration: Individuals equipped with corporate entrepreneurship skills become invaluable assets to their organizations. They are poised to take on leadership roles, drive strategic initiatives, and contribute significantly to their companies' growth trajectories.

Entrepreneurial Skillset: Learning the art of corporate entrepreneurship imparts a versatile skillset that transcends job titles. Professionals gain the ability to identify market gaps, propose innovative solutions, and drive change even from within established hierarchies.

Personal Branding: Embracing corporate entrepreneurship fosters a reputation for being a proactive, innovative, and dynamic professional. This can open doors to exciting career opportunities and help individuals stand out in competitive job markets.


Leveraging Corporate Entrepreneurship for Career and Business Ventures:

The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship  not only equips individuals with skills to thrive within organizations but also empowers them to embark on entrepreneurial journeys of their own.


Career Advancement: Professionals who demonstrate a keen understanding of corporate entrepreneurship principles are more likely to be considered for leadership positions. Their ability to drive innovation and adapt to changing business landscapes makes them indispensable assets to any organization.


Entrepreneurial Endeavors: Armed with the mindset and skillset of corporate entrepreneurship, individuals are well-equipped to transition from being employees to becoming successful entrepreneurs. The course nurtures the spirit of calculated risk-taking, resource optimization, and strategic thinking – all essential components for entrepreneurial success.


The Executive Diploma in Corporate Entrepreneurship Excellence offers a transformative learning experience that bridges the gap between traditional business approaches and the demands of a rapidly evolving market. It empowers companies to become innovation powerhouses and individuals to carve out exceptional career trajectories or entrepreneurial journeys. Enroll in this program to embark on a transformative journey that merges innovation, leadership, and business acumen into a potent catalyst for growth and success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at management, corporate management, corporate culture, business and for everyone who wants to improve skills and knowledge at management.

courseDetails.title: Android P - Programming, Development and Certification
courseDetails.shortDescription: New Features Available on Android P Mobile Development
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is meticulously designed to introduce you to the latest features released in the Developer Preview for the upcoming Android P release, ensuring your app stays at the cutting edge of technological advancements. As mobile technology continues to evolve, it is crucial for developers to keep pace with new features and functionalities to maintain competitive and user-friendly applications. This course provides the knowledge and practical skills required to achieve this.


We begin with an in-depth exploration of the new Android Studio and the Pixel 2 Emulator. Android Studio, the official integrated development environment (IDE) for Google's Android operating system, comes with a range of enhancements in its latest version. The Pixel 2 Emulator, meanwhile, allows developers to test their applications on a virtual device that simulates the Pixel 2’s hardware and software environment. By understanding these tools, you can streamline your development process and optimize your workflow for maximum efficiency.


One of the key features we'll cover is the Display Cutout, also known as the "notch." With the increasing trend of edge-to-edge screens, many devices now come with a display cutout at the top for cameras and sensors. This course will show you how to design your app to accommodate various screen shapes and sizes, ensuring that content is displayed optimally without being obscured by the cutout. You'll learn how to use the WindowInsets class to manage cutouts and create a seamless user experience across different devices.


The Image Decoder API is another significant feature in Android P. It provides a modern way to decode images, offering better performance and additional functionalities compared to the BitmapFactory class. The Image Decoder supports animated images and allows for scaling and post-processing of images during decoding. In this course, you'll learn how to implement the Image Decoder API to handle images more efficiently, reducing memory usage and improving the overall performance of your app.


Notifications have been a core feature of Android for a long time, and with Android P, they have become even more powerful. The updated notifications system includes new features such as support for images and smart replies, making it easier for users to interact with notifications without opening the app. This course will guide you through the process of creating and managing these richer, more interactive notifications. You'll learn how to use the Notification.Builder class to customize notifications with images, action buttons, and inline replies, enhancing user engagement and improving the overall user experience.


In addition to these key features, the course will also touch on other noteworthy enhancements in Android P, such as improved security measures, support for the new HEIF image format, and enhancements to the Autofill framework. By the end of this course, you will have a comprehensive understanding of the new features in Android P and how to integrate them into your projects effectively.


Whether you are an experienced developer or just starting your journey in Android development, this course offers valuable insights and practical skills. By staying up-to-date with the latest tools and features, you can ensure your app remains relevant and competitive in the ever-evolving mobile landscape. Join us to master the new features of Android P and take your app development skills to the next level.
targetAudiences: Anyone who is looking for new features of Android P
Someone who wants to keep up with the new features added in Android P

courseDetails.title: Leadership Through Tough Times
courseDetails.shortDescription: How to cope as a Leader in uncertain times
courseDetails.longDescription:
Leadership Through Tough Times - How to cope as a Leader in uncertain times aims to help anyone in positions of responsibility as a:

- Manager

- Unit leaders

- Business owner

- Responsible for others and outcomes

- Anyone needing to make difficult decisions in times that seem uncertain


It looks at the various elements that should be at the very least referenced:

- Roles and responsibility

- Clarity of message

- Realistic perspectives

- Possible solutions

- Causes and not just effects of why things are what they are

- Seeking support, help

- How to approach things with sympathy, understanding and empathy, even in tough times

- How to handle tough conversations

- Challenges anyone in a Leadership position will most likely face and much more


Realising that the world around you or that you may be responsible for is changing, sometime, through no fault or contribution of your own, can be daunting. Especially, where it appears there is little by way of responsibility that has been contributed to it as an organisation or by you/your team.

The first thing is to find a place of respite and calm. A space, (not necessarily a physical place, sometimes can be, but a state of mind), that facilitates or promotes a balanced thought process. This is what this course aims to do.

Looking at periods of uncertainty from this perspective will help you make decisions backed by sound judgement and reason, rather than from a place that is a reaction, sometimes, raw, unrefined, to the situation, oftentimes creating worse situations.


I hope you find the points, references and topics discussed in this course helpful in those times. I developed them to help you in times of need and possible desperation.


It may not answer all your questions, but, it should help you make a start towards addressing the key issues you need to tackle as a leader or someone in a position of responsibility.


Thank you and I look forward to your feedback.


Best regards,

Baba

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT i Sztuczna Inteligencja: Kompleksowe szkolenie z AI
courseDetails.shortDescription: Zdobądź mistrzostwo w sztucznej inteligencji: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude AI- kompletny przewodnik po sztucznej inteligencji
courseDetails.longDescription:
Kompleksowe szkolenie z ChatGPT i AI:

Czy jesteś gotowy, aby każdy dzień rozpoczynać z osobistym asystentem, który realizuje Twoje zadania z niezrównaną precyzją i szybkością? Sztuczna inteligencja, która potrafi pisać Twoje maile, artykuły czy raporty, tworzyć inspirujące obrazy, analizować skomplikowane dane, dostarczać niestandardowe rozwiązania i rozwiązywać liczne problemy, umożliwiając Ci skupienie się na tym, co naprawdę ważne.

Aby w pełni wykorzystać te korzyści, musisz opanować AI. Wiele osób ekscytuje się, realizuje 2-3 prompty i na tym kończy, nie odkrywając prawdziwego potencjału sztucznej inteligencji. Często wynika to z braku znajomości technik, metod i ustawień, które pozwalają uzyskać najlepsze wyniki z AI.

Celem tego szkolenia jest przekazanie Ci wszystkich kluczy do efektywnej komunikacji z AI, jej optymalnej konfiguracji i pełnego wykorzystania jej możliwości.

Aby to osiągnąć, opracowałem zwięzły i dynamiczny program, który pozwoli Ci zdobyć niezbędną wiedzę i umiejętności do optymalnego wykorzystania AI.

W trakcie tego szkolenia wspólnie omówimy:

  • Jak formułować jasne zapytania do AI, aby uzyskać najlepsze możliwe odpowiedzi.

  • Jak skonfigurować ChatGPT, aby stał się Twoim nauczycielem, współzałożycielem lub zaufanym analitykiem.

  • Jak generować wiele pomysłów i stawać się lepszym w swojej pracy, bardziej produktywnym, szybszym, bardziej trafnym i efektywnym.

  • Jak w pełni wykorzystać multimodalność ChatGPT, aby pisać do niego, mówić, słuchać, przekazywać obrazy i prosić o ich interpretację.

  • Jak zmusić Dall-e lub Copilot do generowania najlepszych możliwych obrazów.

  • Jak znaleźć interesujące alternatywy dla płatnej wersji ChatGPT.

  • Zbadamy także inne AI, takie jak Copilot, Claude czy Gemini.

  • Dowiemy się, jak dostosować ChatGPT do Twoich preferencji i specyficznych potrzeb, aby uzyskać niestandardowe odpowiedzi.

  • Zobaczymy, jak wzmocnić ChatGPT dzięki GPT: jak używać tych aplikacji i nawet jak je tworzyć bez bycia programistą.

  • Przyjrzymy się również bardziej technicznym zagadnieniom na końcu szkolenia, takim jak zarządzanie API, playground, integracja ChatGPT z innymi programami jak Excel czy Google Sheets.

I przede wszystkim, zobaczymy, że to wszystko jest dostępne dla każdego, nawet dla początkujących.

W tym szkoleniu znajdziesz:

  • Konkretne demonstracje.

  • Arkusze techniczne i praktyczne przewodniki do pobrania.


[Aktualizacja: Dodałem filmy dotyczące użycia modelu GPT-4o, który jest następcą wersji GPT-4]

W skrócie, przystępujesz do jasnego, dostępnego i angażującego kursu. Jest on wystarczająco szczegółowy, aby pokryć kluczowe pojęcia, bez zbędnego przeciągania. Niezależnie od Twojego poziomu zaawansowania, czy jesteś początkujący, czy szukasz zaawansowanych technik, to jedyne szkolenie, jakiego potrzebujesz, aby opanować ChatGPT.


Moja prezentacja:

Nazywam się Yassine Rochd, jestem założycielem organizacji szkoleniowej, która pomogła tysiącom osób osiągnąć ich cele zawodowe.

Jestem także pasjonatem technologii. Po ukończeniu studiów magisterskich z finansów i doświadczeniu w konsultingu oraz funduszach inwestycyjnych, odbyłem szkolenie z zakresu web developmentu i spędziłem setki godzin na odkrywaniu i używaniu AI.

Dziś chcę przekazać Ci w jak najjaśniejszy sposób to, czego nauczyłem się przez ostatnie lata.


Certyfikacja i gwarancja:

Po ukończeniu tego szkolenia otrzymasz certyfikat, który będziesz mógł udostępnić na LinkedIn.

Szkolenie jest również bez ryzyka, ponieważ obejmuje 30-dniową gwarancję satysfakcji lub zwrotu pieniędzy.

Masz dożywotni dostęp do szkolenia, zasobów do pobrania oraz przyszłych aktualizacji.

Jesteś o krok od opanowania niezwykle przydatnej technologii, która uczyni Cię bardziej efektywnym, produktywnym i po prostu niezastąpionym.


Szczegółowy opis poszczególnych sekcji tego kursu:

Szybki start z ChatGPT

Dowiedz się, jak szybko opanować ChatGPT w zaledwie kilku filmach. Zanurz się w intuicyjny interfejs ChatGPT i naucz się tworzyć pierwsze prompty, aby w pełni wykorzystać moc AI. Niezależnie od tego, czy chcesz generować tabele, brainstormować, generować pomysły, tłumaczyć i poprawiać teksty, czy też pisać różnorodne treści, z AI będziesz działać szybciej i wydajniej. Zobacz, jak ChatGPT może pomóc w poszukiwaniu pracy i dostosować się do Twoich potrzeb zawodowych, aby zwiększyć efektywność. Zobaczysz, że ChatGPT jest w stanie tworzyć mnóstwo treści, od maili i listów po artykuły i posty na mediach społecznościowych, nie zapominając o pisaniu kodu komputerowego.

Podstawy prompt engineering

Dowiedz się, dlaczego prompt engineering jest kluczowy i jak może przekształcić ChatGPT w prawdziwego eksperta. Zrozum, jak ważny jest kontekst i cele w strukturze interakcji, oraz jak dostosować format i temperaturę, aby zoptymalizować prompty i zmieniać poziom kreatywności modelu. Personalizuj swoje interakcje, opanowując ton i styl, i skorzystaj z 5 praktycznych wskazówek, aby uzyskać jeszcze bardziej trafne odpowiedzi od ChatGPT.

Zaawansowane techniki prompt engineering

W tej sekcji zobaczymy, jak tworzyć prompty, które same generują inne prompty. Przestudiujemy metodę reverse engineering, funkcje wyszukiwania w sieci, interpretacji obrazów i wiele innych zaawansowanych technik.

Dall-e

Przejdziemy do generowania obrazów za pomocą Dall-e. Zobaczysz, jak przejść od przeciętnego wyniku do estetycznych i inspirujących dzieł, jak prosto i szybko modyfikować fragmenty obrazów i optymalizować wyniki. Zbadamy również zaawansowane techniki, które pozwolą na przykład na tworzenie ciągłości w generowaniu postaci fikcyjnych lub komiksowych, dla jeszcze bardziej imponujących rezultatów.

Rozwiązania dla ograniczeń ChatGPT i AI

ChatGPT i inne modele sztucznej inteligencji mają swoje ograniczenia i słabości. W tej sekcji omówimy, jakie są te ograniczenia i jak je przezwyciężyć.

Ciekawe funkcje ChatGPT

Naucz się konfigurować funkcje udostępniania swoich rozmów dla wspólnej pracy z ChatGPT. Wykorzystaj w pełni aplikację mobilną Chat GPT, eksplorując wszystkie oferowane opcje. Odkryj metody tworzenia unikalnych treści za pomocą AI, unikając plagiatu i duplikacji treści.

Copilot i Bing

Copilot oferuje kilka interesujących alternatyw dla płatnych i zaawansowanych funkcji ChatGPT. Zobaczymy, jak skorzystać z partnerstwa Microsoftu i OpenAI, aby uzyskać dostęp do zaawansowanych funkcji sztucznej inteligencji zintegrowanych z wyszukiwarką Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral i inne

W kontynuacji poprzedniej sekcji zbadamy inne AI, takie jak Gemini od Google czy Claude od Anthropic. Zobaczymy ich mocne i słabe strony oraz zbadamy różne przypadki użycia, aby wiedzieć, kiedy lepiej wybrać je zamiast ChatGPT.

Custom Instructions ChatGPT

Dostosuj ChatGPT do swoich potrzeb i oczekiwań. Naucz się personalizować swoje interakcje, konfigurując swoje custom instructions. Odkryj również, na co zwracać uwagę, aby optymalnie korzystać z AI.

GPTs

ChatGPT is revolutionizing how businesses operate. From writing blog posts and social media content to crafting product descriptions and handling customer inquiries, this AI tool can help you perform tasks more efficiently and at a fraction of the cost. Instead, you’ll have the power to automate processes and focus on scaling your business.


In this course, you’ll learn how to:

  • Capitalize on freelance and affiliate marketing opportunities: Use ChatGPT to create professional writing services or affiliate marketing content that generates passive income streams. We’ll show you how to scale these opportunities while keeping your workload manageable.

  • Create and sell digital products: Learn how to use ChatGPT to quickly draft, format, and polish digital products like e-books, online courses, and templates that you can sell on platforms like Amazon or directly through your website—creating long-term passive income.

  • Master email marketing and sales copywriting: Write persuasive sales copy, marketing emails, and product descriptions that convert leads into paying customers. ChatGPT will help you create compelling copy that aligns with your brand voice and objectives.

  • Automate your social media strategy: Craft engaging social media posts and automate responses to keep your followers engaged without having to spend hours on content creation.


Who is this course for?


Whether you’re looking to enhance your existing business or start a new online venture, this course is for anyone who wants to harness the power of AI to make money online. You don’t need to be a tech expert to benefit from this course—this course is designed to be beginner-friendly while offering advanced techniques for those who want to take full advantage of ChatGPT’s potential.


  • Freelancers and Content Creators: If you’re a freelancer offering services like writing, marketing, or social media management, this course will show you how to streamline your processes and serve more clients without increasing your workload.

  • Entrepreneurs and Small Business Owners: Learn how to automate customer service, content creation, and digital marketing to scale your business efficiently, allowing you to focus on growth and revenue-generating activities.

  • Aspiring Online Business Owners: If you’re new to the online business world and want to create digital products or start affiliate marketing, this course will provide you with the tools and strategies to succeed using AI.


What makes this course different?


This isn’t just another course about making money online—this course focuses on practical, actionable techniques using one of the most advanced AI tools available today. ChatGPT can help you automate tasks that would normally take hours or even days, allowing you to increase your productivity and scale your business faster than ever before.


Plus, you won’t just learn theory—you’ll receive hands-on guidance with real-world examples to help you apply everything you learn directly to your business or freelance work. Whether it’s writing optimized blog posts or crafting persuasive marketing campaigns, you’ll finish this course with the knowledge and confidence to start leveraging ChatGPT immediately.


By the end of this course, you will be able to:


  • Confidently use ChatGPT to automate content creation and marketing efforts

  • Scale your business by integrating AI-powered solutions that save time and increase efficiency

  • Develop multiple income streams through affiliate marketing, freelancing, and digital product creation

Don’t miss out on the future of online business. Enroll now to start using ChatGPT to transform your online ventures, make money, and create a more efficient, scalable business model—all while freeing up more time to focus on what matters most.

courseDetails.title: सीखें WordPress हिन्दी में

courseDetails.longDescription:
आपका स्वागत है आखिरी WordPress कोर्स में! यह कोर्स आपको WordPress के सभी मूल और मौलिक अवधारणाओं को सिखाने के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया है, और सिर्फ़ ब्लॉगिंग साइट बल्कि व्यापारिक वेबसाइट को शून्य से बनाने के तरीके को सीखने के लिए।

हम पहले WordPress इंटरफ़ेस और उसके विभिन्न घटकों की खोज करेंगे, और फिर ब्लॉगिंग साइट बनाने के महत्वपूर्ण विशेषताओं में प्रवेश करेंगे। आप सीखेंगे कि लोकलहोस्ट पर WordPress को कैसे स्थापित और सेटअप करें, सामग्री बनाएं और प्रबंधित करें, और अपनी साइट को सर्च इंजन के लिए अनुकूलित कैसे करें।

अगले, हम WordPress का उपयोग करके व्यापारिक वेबसाइट बनाने के तरीकों पर आगे बढ़ेंगे। आप सीखेंगे कि कैसे एक थीम का चयन करें और कस्टमाइज़ करें, पेज, मेनू, और साइडबार बनाएं, और संपर्क फॉर्म्स और सोशल मीडिया जैसे आवश्यक व्यापारिक सुविधाओं को कैसे शामिल करें।

हम यह भी कवर करेंगे कि अपनी साइट को लोकलहोस्ट से ऑनलाइन सर्वर पर कैसे माइग्रेट किया जाए। आप सीखेंगे कि अपनी WordPress साइट को बैकअप और रिस्टोर कैसे करें, अपनी फ़ाइल्स और डेटाबेस को कैसे ट्रांसफ़र करें, और सामान्य माइग्रेशन की सामान्य दिक्कतों से कैसे बचा जा सकता है।

इसके अलावा, हम डोमेन और होस्टिंग सेटअप प्रक्रिया की भी जाँच करेंगे। आप सीखेंगे कि सही डोमेन और होस्टिंग प्रदाता का चयन कैसे करें, अपने डोमेन और होस्टिंग को कैसे सेटअप करें, और अपनी साइट को एक होस्टिंग प्रदाता से दूसरे होस्टिंग प्रदाता में कैसे माइग्रेट करें।

इस कोर्स का सबसे अच्छा हिस्सा यह है कि हम अपने छात्रों के अनुरोधों के आधार पर समय-समय पर नए व्याख्यान जोड़ते हैं। हम चाहते हैं कि आपको WordPress के बारे में नवीनतम और सबसे मूल्यवान जानकारी तक पहुँच मिले।

और, मैं व्यक्तिगत रूप से छात्रों के सभी प्रश्नों का उत्तर देता हूँ। इसलिए, अगर आपके पास कोई प्रश्न या चिंता है, तो हमसे पूछने

courseDetails.title: Complete Wordpress Website Developer Course

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the ultimate WordPress course! This course is designed to teach you all the basics and fundamental concepts of WordPress, and how to build a fully functional blogging site and business website from scratch.

We will start by exploring the WordPress interface and its various components and then delve into the essential features of building a blogging site. You will learn how to install and setup WordPress on localhost, create and manage content, and optimize your site for search engines.

Next, we will move on to building a business website using WordPress. You will learn how to choose and customize a theme, create pages, menus, and sidebars, and integrate essential business features such as contact forms and social media.

We will also cover how to migrate your site from localhost to an online server. You will learn how to backup and restore your WordPress site, transfer your files and database, and avoid common migration pitfalls.

In addition, we will explore the domain and hosting setup process. You will learn how to choose the right domain and hosting provider, how to set up your domain and hosting, and how to migrate your site from one hosting provider to another.

courseDetails.title: Public Relations: Crisis Communications Oil and Gas Industry
courseDetails.shortDescription: Public Relations: Oil/Gas/Chemical executives will learn step-by-step what to do with the news media before a crisis
courseDetails.longDescription:
Public Relations: Imagine the worst: an explosion or leak has hit your operations and now the news media are swarming around you. But now imagine yourself looking poised, facing the toughest questions and getting the exact messages and quotes you want into the final news stories. You will not become another Tony Hayward!

This course is for oil and gas industry executives who may have to face the media during a Public Relations crisis. You will learn exactly how to look comfortable, prepare messages, answer questions and speak in sound bites. You will learn how to avoid disastrous sound bites and off message quotes that have cost other energy companies billions of dollars in market cap in the past. You will be prepared to face the media in the future if and when you suffer a Public Relations crisis.

The BP Gulf disaster cost that company tens of billions of dollars in market cap, in part, because of how poorly their executives handled the media during this Public Relations crisis. You can learn from their mistakes.

TJ Walker has conducted media training and Public Relations crisis communications training workshops for oil and gas industry executives from the Middle East to Texas to around the world. He will give you real world examples of exactly what to do and not do during a crisis.

If a  disaster hits your refinery, tanker, or well, the whole world is going to see it. The media will come calling. You must have good answers to fair questions. "No comment" will be interpreted as the guilt of negligence and environmental lawbreaking. And bad answers will generate headlines around the world, especially if you claim that you "want your life back!"

You can't control all events surrounding a crisis and you can't control the media's questions, but you CAN control your message, your answers and your sound bites. If you are an energy executive, you owe it to yourself, your career and your company's brand to sign up today for the Crisis Communications Training for Oil and Gas Executives Course.

A crisis could hit your oil and gas industry or energy operations today or even tonight at Midnight. don't let another second go by without preparing yourself for the media that might soon surround you.

courseDetails.title: Applied Behavior Analysis for Children with Autism Spectrum
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) Principles- Behavior Management Strategies for ASD
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) course tailored specifically for children with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD). This comprehensive course is designed to equip learners with the knowledge, tools, and strategies needed to understand and apply ABA principles effectively in working with children on the autism spectrum. Through a combination of theoretical foundations, practical examples, and interactive exercises, participants will gain valuable insights into the application of ABA techniques to support the development and well-being of children with ASD.

Certification-

Earn a Personalized Certificate from Vidya Retreat, a Prestigious Internationally Recognized Organization.


Understanding Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD): Gain a comprehensive understanding of Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) through an exploration of its defining characteristics, diagnostic criteria, and theoretical perspectives. Delve into the ways in which ASD impacts development and behavior, providing a foundational understanding necessary for effective intervention and support.

Introduction to Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA): Discover the fundamental principles of Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) and its application to working with children on the autism spectrum. Learn how the behavior analytic approach helps in understanding behavior, including the ABCs of Behavior (Antecedents, Behaviors, Consequences), and the importance of data collection and analysis in guiding intervention strategies.

ABA Techniques for Skill Acquisition: Explore a range of ABA techniques aimed at fostering skill acquisition in children with ASD. From Discrete Trial Training (DTT) to naturalistic teaching strategies, prompting and prompt fading, reinforcement strategies, and task analysis and chaining, discover effective methods for promoting skill development tailored to individual needs.

ABA Techniques for Behavior Reduction: Learn strategies for addressing challenging behaviors commonly exhibited by children with ASD. Through Functional Behavior Assessment (FBA), Behavior Intervention Plans (BIPs), and techniques for replacement behaviors, explore ways to effectively reduce problem behaviors while promoting positive alternatives. Discover methods for generalization and maintenance to ensure long-term success.

Designing and Implementing ABA Programs: Gain practical insights into the design and implementation of individualized ABA programs for children with ASD. Explore the role of the Individualized Education Program (IEP) and collaborative team approaches in program development. Learn how to set meaningful goals, monitor progress, and make data-driven adjustments to optimize outcomes.

Ethical Considerations in ABA Practice: Examine the ethical considerations inherent in ABA practice, with a focus on upholding professional standards and ensuring the rights and well-being of individuals with ASD. Explore issues related to client rights, confidentiality, cultural competence, and advocacy, equipping you with the knowledge and skills necessary for ethical and effective practice.


Key Takeaways:

  • Understanding of Autism Spectrum Disorder and its impact on behavior and development.

  • Proficiency in applying principles of Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) to support children with ASD.

  • Familiarity with a range of ABA techniques for skill acquisition and behavior reduction.

  • Ability to design and implement individualized ABA programs tailored to the needs of children with ASD.

  • Ethical considerations and cultural competence in ABA practice
targetAudiences: Special Education Teachers
Behavior Analysts
Psychologists
Speech-Language Pathologists
Occupational Therapists
Parents and Caregivers of Children with ASD
Anyone interested in working with children on the autism spectrum
